import React from 'react' import '../components.css' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { firestoreConnect } from 'react-redux-firebase' import { compose } from 'redux' const BookDetails = (props) => { let id = props.match.params.id; return (

) } const mapStateToProps = (state, ownProps) => { console.log(state) const id = ownProps.match.params.id const books = state.firestore.data.books const book = books ? books[id] : null console.log(book) return { book: book } } export default compose( connect(mapStateToProps), firestoreConnect([ { collection: 'books'} ]) )(BookDetails)
